Description: LTD JH-600EC in good used condition. Alder body with maple neck through, and ebony fretboard. Kahler hybrid tremelo, and EMG 81-85. Guitar shows signs of playing with some light scratches and small dings but overall good condition. (See pics, i tried to point out the worst 3 dings with my finger). Guitar is set up with super light strings in standard tuning with teflon string sleeves to help tuning stability. (Really helps with kahler tremelos). Hard case made by rockcase and is in fair condition with a lot of stickers that have been peeled off leaving sticker residue. Tears in the tolex and various signs of wear. All latches function 100% and beyong the cosmetics it works fine and protects the guitar great! Shipping to lower 48 USA. Please email with any questions, thanks! From the manufacturer: Description Jeff Hanneman Electric Guitar Black. "The ESP LTD JH-600EC Jeff Hanneman Signature electric guitar features neck-thru-body construction, an alder body, and a 24.75"" scale maple neck on a single-cutaway body. The extra thin U-shaped neck contour and 24 extra jumbo frets make the JH-600EC an extremely playable instrument. Armed with an iconic pair of active pickups-EMG81 in the bridge position and EMG85 in the neck position-this guitar can handle plenty of gain and boasts unmatched tonal articulation. High-end appointments include a Kahler Hybrid locking tremolo system, Gotoh tuning machines, all-black hardware and Hanneman-inspired red star inlays adorn its beautiful ebony fretboard." Features & details The Jeff Hanneman JH600EC BLK has an Alder Body with a Maple Neck and an Ebony Fingerboard This Guitar comes equipped with a Kahler Hybrid Bridge & Locking Nut and Grover Tuners It has a 24.75" Scale with Neck-Thru Body Construction, 24 Extra Jumbo Frets and an Extra Thin-U Neck Contour The Pickups are active EMG 81(b) & EMG 85(n) The Controls are Vol/Tone with a Toggle Switch Hardshell Case Model: CECFF Sold Separately Product information Item Weight 12.4 pounds Product Dimensions 42.9 x 19.3 x 7.5 inches Item model number LJH600EC Body Material Alder Fretboard Material Ebony Guitar Pickup Configuration humbucker Neck Material Type Maple Number of Strings6
Title: LTD JH-600 EC Jeff Hanneman signature Kahler EMG 81-85 with Hard Case
